summary:
I am an independent IT professional with more than twenty-five years of work experience in business and information analysis, functional design, vendor management, project management, and general IT-related consultancy, and fifteen years in energy markets. My original background in classical studies and philosophy makes me particularly alert to matters of communication and extends my vision well beyond the technical realm. 

My main experience and interest lie in complex, multi-party projects in an international setting. Key features of my approach are: pragmatism, diplomacy and a continuous pursuit of simplicity. Making the best possible use of my own time and that of my colleagues is an ongoing concern.
